entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening and ending before morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
